description: This file defines theme-related constants, color schemes, and UI decoration styles for a Flutter application, including color tokens, radii, spacing, decorations, and a comprehensive ThemeData configuration for the Ocean Professional theme.

classes.name: AppColors
classes.description: Provides centralized color tokens used across the app, including brand, surface, text, and border colors.

classes.name: Radii
classes.description: Defines standardized corner radius values for UI components.

classes.name: Spacing
classes.description: Defines spacing scale constants based on a 4px grid for consistent layout spacing.

classes.name: AppDecorations
classes.description: Provides UI decoration styles such as ocean-themed background and section divider.

methods.name: oceanBg
methods.description: Returns a BoxDecoration with a linear gradient for ocean-themed background.

methods.name: sectionDivider
methods.description: Returns a widget representing a section divider with gradient fade edges, customizable margin.
